attributes.action: Review immigration rules for people from 7 Muslim Nations who pose a threat.
attributes.background: For the UK to support the US and adopt the same rules of entry to persons with passports issued from countries associated with the support of terrorism.

rejection.details: We're not sure whether you'd like a review of the immigration rules, or whether you're asking for a specific change to the rules. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
